content: In light of the regular discussions on the subject of terminology and notation here, I propose the acronyms FWOBN (For Want Of Better Notation) and FWOBT (For Want Of Better Terminology) for your collective consideration. If you don't like the second one it becomes self-referential.
There is a stream already no? #general: terminology & notation
This topic was moved here from #general: off-topic > acronyms by Morgan Rogers (he/him).
